summary: VA provides health care to over 9 million veterans each year. It also funds research on veterans’ health conditions—including chronic conditions, like diabetes, and illnesses and injuries resulting from military service, like traumatic brain injury. We reviewed, among other things, how VA works to help translate research findings into clinical practice to improve care. For example, VA researchers are studying the delivery of psychotherapy for...
title: VA Health Care: Efforts to Prioritize and Translate Research into Clinical Practice
